text: People are loving the video of Chris Hemsworth dancing to Miley Cyrus'' Wrecking Ball'with his dog and three kids. ( Photo : FREDERIC J. BROWN, AFP / Getty Images ) You know what can take down Thor? Miley Cyrus and a dog. And they did, in this gushingly cute video of Chris Hemsworth jamming out to Cyrus'` ` Wrecking Ball'' before being tackled by his dog and kids. Hemsworth faces his back to the camera in his self - described ` ` ground breaking music video,'' swaying side to side with his hands in the air.
